page.title: 04Clubs in Sampford Courtney
page.content: The Sampford Courtney{Brownies}meet at the village hall from 7p.m.until 8p.m. weekly.There are 7 Brownies aged between 7 and 10.The leader is Mrs Pye (Tiggy)her helper(Mrs.Leatheren) is Wren.They play games and do crafts. There is no Guide group in the village and once girls are too old for Brownies they have to go to North Tawton to join the Guide Pack there. {Flower arranging Club }meets weekly in the village hall.They have demonstrations in flower arranging. {The Art Club}meets weekly to paint and listen to talks. {Help the Aged Club }meets monthly as a social meeting and to learn how to do craft things.
